content.raw:
Another weird crash. Let me know if it works on your computer.

Insert a link.

Select a face using the align tool. Make sure the face is selected (red) for the next step.

Exit and save (trying to go to the main window). Gazebo crashes.

It may be another `Visual::SetVisibility` issue.

```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff746a9eb in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (this=0x4eb4b00, 
    _visible=false, _cascade=true)
    at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
1512	  this->dataPtr->sceneNode->setVisible(_visible, _cascade);
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff746a9eb in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (
    this=0x4eb4b00, _visible=false, _cascade=true)
    at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
#1  0x0000000000538039 in gazebo::gui::ModelSnap::Reset (
    this=0x989be0 <SingletonT<gazebo::gui::ModelSnap>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/ModelSnap.cc:117
#2  0x00000000004b21d5 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnManipMode (this=0x217d0a0, 
    _mode=...) at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:979
#3  0x00000000004c50ec in boost::_mfi::mf1<void, gazebo::gui::GLWidget, std::string const&>::operator() (this=0x219ef28, p=0x217d0a0, a1=...)
    at /usr/include/boost/bind/mem_fn_template.hpp:165
```
content.html:
Another weird crash. Let me know if it works on your computer.

Insert a link.

Select a face using the align tool. Make sure the face is selected (red) for the next step.

Exit and save (trying to go to the main window). Gazebo crashes.

It may be another Visual::SetVisibility issue.

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff746a9eb in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (this=0x4eb4b00, 
    _visible=false, _cascade=true)
    at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
1512      this->dataPtr->sceneNode->setVisible(_visible, _cascade);
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff746a9eb in gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetVisible (
    this=0x4eb4b00, _visible=false, _cascade=true)
    at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc:1512
#1  0x0000000000538039 in gazebo::gui::ModelSnap::Reset (
    this=0x989be0 <SingletonT<gazebo::gui::ModelSnap>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/ModelSnap.cc:117
#2  0x00000000004b21d5 in gazebo::gui::GLWidget::OnManipMode (this=0x217d0a0, 
    _mode=...) at /home/jackie/code/gazebo/gazebo/gui/GLWidget.cc:979
#3  0x00000000004c50ec in boost::_mfi::mf1<void, gazebo::gui::GLWidget, std::string const&>::operator() (this=0x219ef28, p=0x217d0a0, a1=...)
    at /usr/include/boost/bind/mem_fn_template.hpp:165
